mdRecord.dcterms:title: Ex-Lax tin

mdRecord.dcterms:description: Writing on tin: "For relief of constipation; EX-LAX; Reg. U.S. Pat. Off.; The Chocolated Laxative; Active Ingredients: White Phenolphthalein U.S.P.; Yellow Phenolphthalein Not U.S.P.; 18 tablets 25 cents; Ex-Lax, Inc.; Brooklyn N.Y." Container is empty
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
